About Me

Hi, I am Joshua Bimson,
I am a Mechanical Engineer with experience designing and building robotic systems and mechanical components. I am skilled in rapid prototyping using many different technologies, including CAD/CAM, 3D Printing, and CNC machining.

Access my resume here: Resume

Education

I graduated from California State University, Sacramento with a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering in 2021.

Mechanical Engineer, Advanced Farm Technologies

2022 — 2025

Designed and prototyped mechanical and robotic systems for specialty crop harvest, including strawberry and apple. Developed a custom robot arm kinematic to optimize speed, reliability, and cost in robotic apple harvest.

Mechanical Engineer, NovaSource Power Services

2017 — 2022

Developed robots and supporting systems for automated solar panel cleaning. Deployed cleaning robot fleets domestically and internationally.
